import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';//Variables en donde se almacenaran los datos de las busquedas
var initialState={listProducts:[],productDetail:{},productDescription:""};export var productSlice=createSlice({name:'product',initialState:initialState,reducers:{//Metodo para cargar los datos de la busqueda
setListProduct:function setListProduct(state,action){state.listProducts=action.payload;},//Metodo para cargar los datos de la busqueda
setProductDetail:function setProductDetail(state,action){state.productDetail=action.payload;},setProductDescription:function setProductDescription(state,action){state.productDescription=action.payload;}}});//Se exportan los metodos para poder ser usados globalmente
var _productSlice$actions=productSlice.actions,setListProduct=_productSlice$actions.setListProduct,setProductDetail=_productSlice$actions.setProductDetail,setProductDescription=_productSlice$actions.setProductDescription;export{setListProduct,setProductDetail,setProductDescription};export default productSlice.reducer;
